english.segment1: Thy kingdom come. thy will be done. on earth as it is in heaven
english.segment2: i can, i can call on you. i know that you'll hear me. i can, i can call on you. i know that you'll answer
english.segment3: you didn't know what to do. came home from after school. mom and dad said they were through. now pretty soon was gonna have ta move. shut the door went inside his room. layed on the floor and he cried to you. said Jesus please help me through. right now i just feel so confused. don't know what i'm supposed to do. but i need to be close to you. help me with what i'm going through. cuz i know that your here when i'm calling you. everything just falling through. but aint nutting too hard for you. so please come when i call to you. cuz all that i have is all in you. and that's why
